title: Horror Music Soundtrack Collection Vol. 1
description: 11 Original songs with a mix of ambient, rhythmic and mysterious horror-style vibes.
longDescription:
Demo Reel Here: Isekai Sound - Horror Music Asset Pack Preview


This collection contains 11 original songs (compositions) with a mix of ambient, rhythmic and mysterious horror-style vibes. These are perfect for menus, save themes, dialogue/text-based elements (and subtitles), and can also mixed in the background to allow for voiced dialogue to be heard well.


All files are in .WAV format.


The following tracks of collection are suitable for looping:

1 - Retrospective; 3 - Living in my Head II; 4 - Reflection; 5 - A Hidden Message; 6 - The Other Side; 7- Dreams of Another Realm; 9 - Searching the Heart; 10 - Troubling Outlook; 11 - Peaceful Reminder


Track descriptions:

Track 01 - Retrospective

  • Instrumentation - Strings, Brass, Piano, Mallets, Guitar, Floaty Synthesizers, Low-presence Choir, Vibrating Synthesizers
  • Mood - Somber, Reflective, Introspective, Light Tension, Nostalgic, Memories, Light dramatic elements
  • Scene - Excellent for memory sequences, wonderment sections, and flashbacks/storytelling

Track 02 - Living in My Head I

  • Instrumentation - Distorted sound design elements, unsettling choir, breathing-style sounds
  • Mood - Dark, disturbing, evolving, mysterious, fear, anxiety, creepy
  • Scene - Great for build-up and dark, advancing story sequences. Think impending, unknown danger.

Track 03 - Living in My Head II

  • Instrumentation - Light brass, airy sounds, floaty sounds/synths
  • Mood - Unsettling peacefulness, reflection, memory-searching, light, floaty, uncertain, mysterious
  • Great for flashbacks and story sequences

Track 04 - Reflection

  • Instrumentation - Choir, acoustic guitar, mid-high pitch piano, reverb and delay, high-pitched string section
  • Mood - Reflective, peaceful, light-hearted
  • Scene - Great for BGM/background music for title screens, pause screens, save rooms

Track 05 - A Hidden Message

  • Instrumentation - Cello, Low-mid pitch piano, mid-high strings/choir
  • Mood - Mysterious, intriguing, pulsating, rhythmic, palpable
  • Scene - Solving a mystery, pondering details and ideas, uncertain discussions, skepticism, lack of trust, shady characters

Track 06 - The Other Side

  • Instrumentation - Unstable Synthesizers, Synthesized Bells, Low-pitch piano, honky synth, evolving low-pitch synth, synth chord stabs
  • Mood - Silent shock, dark surprise, horrible gut-feeling, gut-wrenching, unsettling, discord, dissonance, fear, ominous
  • Scene - Character makes a terrifying discovery or realization, fear settles in

Track 07 - Dreams of Another Realm

  • Instrumentation - Sparse and filtered drums, bubbling filtered synthesizers, retro sounding strings (mid-high pitch), VHS effects (vinyl, grainy, light reverb), Stable organ (no vibrato), electric piano (low-mid pitch)
  • Mood - Resolution, approaching conclusion, reflective, understanding, mixed response, mixed feelings, mixed emotions, slightly optimistic, slight skepticism, low-grade disbelief, cautious optimism
  • Scene - Credits, Intro, Outro, Important story elements theme, important conversation theme, motif

Track 08 - Lucifer's Lab

  • Instrumentation - Sound effects in the beginning, oscillating piano, driving acoustic bass, wobbly choir, melodic piano (low-mid pitch), distorted guitar (high-pitch), twinkly piano, layered bass, syncopated melodic rhythm
  • Mood - Dark, disturbing, exploration, mysterious, ominous
  • Scene - Exploration and discovery, antagonist appears, urgent puzzle, escape sequence

Track 09 - Searching the Heart

  • Instrumentation - Choir (high-pitch), Acoustic guitar (lead instrument), reverb, choir (low-pitch humming), piano (high-pitch), organ (no vibrato)
  • Mood - Introspective, reflective, inquisitive
  • Scene - Memory sequence, flashbacks, important story revelation or development, character development moments


Track 10 - Troubling Outlook - A disturbing ambient tone with aleoratic tones and textures. Loopable.

Track 11 - Peaceful Reminder - A piano piece with some added elements to introduce a sense of resolution. Loopable.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  11 original fully composed and recorded songs (7 looping-capable tracks)
  •  Strong mood and tone settings for each track
  •  High-quality recordings in .WAV format ready to use for your mystery, puzzle, or horror project

Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 29 Minutes 10 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/isekai-sound-studios/sets/iseaki-sound-horror-music-pack

Important/Additional Notes: Tracks 2 (Living in My Head I) and 8 (Lucifer's Lab) are not suitable for looping as-is. Editing may make them suitable for looping.
